about_the_game: Join composer Joel Steudler for a journey through the horror, hope, and heroism of the fourteenth century. War and the Black Death swept across Europe and beyond, touching kings and commoners from all nations. The soundtrack to Kingdom Wars 4 features sixteen tracks set in history's deadliest era, visiting Europe, Byzantium, and the eastern Slavic lands for an epic symphonic tour.
detailed_description: Join composer Joel Steudler for a journey through the horror, hope, and heroism of the fourteenth century.
